snippet: Seventeen people died at Charlie Hebdo in 2014 and in other attacks in the Paris area in the days that followed.
abstract: Surviving artists and writers for French satirical newspaper Charlie Hebdo release special edition marking one-year anniversary of Jan 7, 2014 attack on paper's staff that claimed 17 lives.
lead_paragraph: Seventeen people died at Charlie Hebdo in 2014 and in other attacks in the Paris area in the days that followed.

headline.main: France: Charlie Hebdo Plans Edition to Mark Anniversary of Massacre
headline.print_headline: Europe; France: Charlie Hebdo Plans Edition to Mark Anniversary of Massacre
